coded_answer.p: My name is German Schmidt anand in the last week I went into your theatre to see the musical show "Over the Rainbow". There arewere some problems, we have to speak about.

At firstFirst, the actor was not Danny Brook, there was a different actor, who I don't know. In the advertisement offor the show it was written that the musical willwould be start at 19:30, but it started at 20:15.
After the musical show I wantwanted to spend some time in your theatre restaurant but it was not open, because all of your cooks and waiters are inon holidaysholiday.
And this was not a perfect evening inand your theatre was very expensive for me. I've payedpaidI paid £ 160 for eight people and there waswere no discounts available.
In my oppinionopinion you have to give some money back to me. I think 50% (£80) areis enough.
If you give nodon't give me any money back, I will go to the newspaper.
At firstFirst I wouldwill say that our technology levellevel of technology, inat thisthe present time areis very high but in the future it wouldwill be higher.
With the help of some modern technology our daily lifelives would not be so difficult.

One pointexample in my life is home banking. With the help of my home computer I can do all kinds of thingthings, aboutwith money, with my bank. Some years ago I havehad to go to the bank. The new way is very easy and faster and I can spentspend my time withon other things. An otherAnother pointexample is the modern technology in my car. Because of the modern technology, the safety level inof my car is very high.
At the endFinally I would say that everybodynone of us can not live without the modern technology, because the modern technology is necessaryessential for us in all parts of our lifelives.
